title: Release Control
itunes:title: Release Control
description:
Discover what the Bible has to say about living life in peace and contentment. John 14:27 teaches, “Stop allowing yourselves to be agitated, disturbed and upset.” Learn how to be content in all circumstances as you let go of your will, release control, and ask God to let His will be done in your life!Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
